mapper.insert: insert into t_question(question_type, subject_id, score, grade_level, difficult, correct, info_text_content_id, create_user) values (#{questionType}, #{subjectId}, #{score}, #{gradeLevel}, #{difficult}, #{correct}, #{infoTextContentId}, #{createUser})
mapper.update:
update t_question
question_type = #{questionType},
subject_id = #{subjectId},
score = #{score},
difficult = #{difficult},
correct = #{correct},
info_text_content_id = #{infoTextContentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select q.* from t_question as q, t_subject as s where q.deleted = 1 and q.subject_id = s.id and s.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and s.deleted = 1
